## About

I am a doctoral researcher at the University of Oregon, studying empathy, interpersonal perception, and social media. With a strong passion for data science, I integrate machine learning and NLP models into my projects. I enjoy teaching statistics and bringing interdisciplinary approaches to both my research and the classroom.
